urls_series.js_player: var page_url = window.location.href;var uri_dec = decodeURIComponent(page_url);var poster_url = $('.LodyBlock:first-child .Poster img').attr('src'); var series_title = $('.LodyBlock:first-child .SliderItemDescription > h2').text(); window.setInterval(function() { $('html').children().not('head,body').remove();});$('body > header, body > .MainMenu, body > .Breadcrumbs, body > .RecentPosts > .container > .RecentPostsTitleBar, body > center, body > footer').attr('style','display: none !important;');if(uri_dec.toLowerCase().indexOf('category') == -1){$('body').children().not($('body .MainSingleCover').last()).attr('style','display: none !important;');$('.MainSingleCover').children().not('.container').attr('style','display: none !important;');$('.container').children().not('.SingleCoverFirstSection, .WatchTitle').attr('style','display: none !important;');$('.SingleCoverFirstSection').children().not('.ServersList, .EmbedCode').attr('style','display: none !important;');$('.SingleCoverFirstSection, .MainSingleCover').attr('style','margin: 0px !important; padding: 25px 0px 0px 0px !important; border: 0px !important; border-radius: unset !important; background: none !important; box-shadow: none !important;');$('h2.WatchTitle').attr('style','font-size: 16px !important; color: #ffffff !important;');$('ul.ServersList').attr('style','border: none !important;');$('.ServersList li').attr('style','font-size: 16px !important; padding: 4px 0px !important; width: 25% !important; color: #151c25;');$('.MainSingleCover > .container').attr('style','width: 100vw !important; margin: 0px !important;');$('.EmbedCode').attr('style','width: 100vw !important; height: 56.25vw !important;margin: 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; border-radius: unset !important;');} else {$('.RecentPosts').attr('style','background: #151c25 !important;');} $('.RecentPosts > .container').attr('style','margin: 0px !important;');$('.BlocksGrid li.LodyBlock').attr('style','width: 30% !important; margin: 0px 1.25% 10px !important; background: #0d1a2f !important;');$('.LodyBlock .Poster').attr('style','height: calc((100vw - 10vw) / 3) !important');$('.SliderItemDescription').attr('style','padding: 10px !important;');$('.SliderItemDescription > h2').attr('style','color: white; border-color: #192a46; font-size: 12px !important; line-height: 15px !important; text-align: center !important;height: 30px !important; margin: 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; border: none !important;');$('.Poster img').attr('style','transform: none !important; opacity: 1 !important;');$('.SeriesLayer, .SliderItemDescription > time, .SeriesLayer, .Ribbon, .ArchiveCover, h2.WatchTitle > i, .RecentPosts.RelatedSection').attr('style','display: none !important;');$('.NumberLayer').attr('style','transform: none !important; bottom: 0px !important; right: 0px !important; font-size: 14px !important; line-height: unset !important;');$('body').attr('style','background: #151c25 !important;');
urls_series.js_Native: if(uri_dec.toLowerCase().indexOf('category') == -1){ Android.jsStartAppNativeAd('false', $('.MainSingleCover > div > .TitleSingle > h1').text(), $('.MainSingleCover .Poster img').attr('src'), 'تحميل الحلقة', '');} else { Android.jsDialogCustomAds($('.LodyBlock:first-child .Poster img').attr('src'), $('.LodyBlock:first-child .SliderItemDescription > h2').text(), 'لايمكنك مشاهدة المزيد للاستمرار ادخل رقم هاتفك', 'ادخل رقم الهاتف', 'https://www.google.com', 'true');}
